title.en: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yokohama Souran-hen

altTitles.en: The Irregular at Magic High School - Yokohama Disturbance Arc

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yokohama Souranhen
Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yokohama Disturbance

altTitles.ru: Непутёвый ученик в школе магии: Волнения в Йокогаме

altTitles.ja: 魔法科高校の劣等生 横浜騒乱編

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔法科高校的劣等生：橫浜騒亂編

altTitles.zh: 魔法科高校的劣等生：横浜騒乱编

altTitles.ja-ro: Mahō-ka Kōkō no Rettō Nama Yokohama Sōran-hen

description.en:
The Nine Schools Competition is over. Now it's time for the Annual Thesis Competition in Yokohama. If the Nine Schools competition was to show off their skills and power, the Thesis competition is a chance for students to show off their knowledge and ingenuity. But it seems this competition is being viewed by an unsavoury group as well. Will Tatsuya come out on top again?  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 6-7.
